name: The Key of Rednow
description:
Guide Phoebe through an uncharted forest to save the dying king:

  • Overcome dangerous foes.
  • Explore meticulously designed maps.
  • Meet a colorful cast of characters.
  • Solve a variety of puzzles.
  • Estimated playtime for first completion: 2-4 hours

Development:

The Key of Rednow is my third completed RPG Maker title, but the first posted for sale online. The alpha version of this game was a gift for my younger sister whose high school video project was the inspiration for the plot.

My focus throughout development was upon gameplay, but some custom art and animations are used to communicate game mechanics.
